title: Lyfe Kitchen - Chicago
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Pizza, Organic, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Opened Nov 2013, it's the 4th location of this healthier eating concept restaurant. Offers a separate vegan menu with range of choices including flatbreads with vegan cheese, soups, salads, quinoa crunch wrap, Gardein chickn burger, mains like risotto and ravioli. Selection of refreshing beverages made with fruit and chia seeds.
